titles: The unhappy favourite, or, The Earl of Essex a tragedy : acted at the Theatre Royal by Their Majesty's servants / written by John Bankes.
author: Banks, John, d. 1706.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
publisher: Printed for Richard Bentley and Mary Magnes ...,
notes: Prologues by Major Mohun, John Dryden and the author. Epilogue also by Dryden.
Later editions appeared under title: The Earl of Essex, or, The unhappy favourite.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Essex, Robert Devereux, --  Earl of, 1566-1601 --  Drama.
